message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our unique product to you. This exceptional item holds significant value for us, and we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. We are offering this product to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This is an opportunity to acquire a valuable asset at a competitive rate. Please let us know if you are interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value you place on this product, $950,000 is slightly above my budget. I'm very interested, but I'd be willing to pay $850,000. This price reflects the value I see in the product and aligns with my financial limitations. I'm open to further discussions, but this is my best offer at this time.

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. After careful consideration, I am pleased to extend a revised offer at $900,000. This price reflects the value we place on the product while remaining competitive with your proposal. I understand your budgetary concerns, and I hope this offer will better align with your financial capabilities. Please let me know if you are able to consider this proposal.
